argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lincval1.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | lincval1.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 3 |  | lincval1.r | |- R = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | lincval1.f | |- F = { <. V , ( 0g ` S ) >. } |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> V e. B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` S ) = ( 0g ` S ) |
| 7 | 2, 3, 6 | #P_lmod0cl | |- ( M e. LMod -> ( 0g ` S ) e. R ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> ( 0g ` S ) e. R ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` S ) e. _V |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_eqeltri | |- R e. _V |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> R e. _V ) |
| 12 | 4 | #P_mapsnop | |- ( ( V e. B /\ ( 0g ` S ) e. R /\ R e. _V ) -> F e. ( R ^m { V } ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 8, 11, 12 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> F e. ( R ^m { V } ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( F e. ( R ^m { V } ) -> F : { V } --> R ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> F : { V } --> R ) |
| 16 |  | #P_snfi | |- { V } e. Fin |
| 17 | 16 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> { V } e. Fin ) |
| 18 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` S ) e. _V |
| 19 | 18 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> ( 0g ` S ) e. _V ) |
| 20 | 15, 17, 19 | #P_fdmfifsupp | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> F finSupp ( 0g ` S ) ) |
| 21 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_lincval1 | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> ( F ( linC ` M ) { V } ) = ( 0g ` M ) ) |
| 22 | 13, 20, 21 | #P_3jca | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> ( F e. ( R ^m { V } ) /\ F finSupp ( 0g ` S ) /\ ( F ( linC ` M ) { V } ) = ( 0g ` M ) ) ) |
